Description: We are excited to announce the addition of two post creation options—Article and Question—to the centralized creation button in Viva Engage for premium users. Starting April 2025, a Viva Engage premium licensed user will be able to create an article or a question post type directly by clicking on the "Create new" button, easing the process of creation of these post types, while also helping users discover them quicker.
